subject: Re: AW: [junit] Testing getXXX( ) and setXXX( ) methods
msgSnippet: ... Agreed. The moment the setX() method does anything more than this.something = something; , it usually becomes worth testing. J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
messageBody:
Quoting Gabriele Brysch <Gabriele.Brysch@...>:

> hi,
>
> but what's about testing setter-methodes, if in there you're
> doing some value (-range) checks ?! i think then it make
> sense to test them ..

Agreed. The moment the setX() method does anything more than "this.something =
something;", it usually becomes worth testing.

J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
President, Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Let's write software that people understand.
